meanings.definition: A woman who washes clothes for a living.
meanings.sent1: The washerwoman diligently scrubbed the clothes clean.
meanings.sent2: The washerwoman comes to our house every Monday to do the laundry.
meanings.sent3: The washerwoman accidentally turned all the white clothes pink!
meanings.sent4: She was a washerwoman of emotions, cleansing away the sorrows of others.
meanings.sent5: The washerwoman's hands were rough from years of washing clothes.
